title: Undone: Volume 8 of the Don't Close Your Eyes Series
description: Who are you when everything you knew about yourself comes undone? I'm in love with a criminal, but we cannot be together. My soul is tortured with no outlet and try as I might, I cannot stay away from Klive, nor he from me. As Nightshade's threat grows from friend to foe, Klive pulls me closer into his mess, but do I go with him into something I cannot undo?
author: Lynessa Layne
